com.swfm.mica
Class MiAWT102Canvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          com.swfm.mica.MiAWT102Canvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, MiiCanvas, java.io.Serializable
public class MiAWT102Canvas
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements MiiCanvas

This class serves as the interface (driver/wrapper) to the old 1.0.2 AWT graphics routines, specifically the AWT Canvas widget.

Version:
%I% %G%
Author:
Michael L. Davis
See Also:
Serialized Form
